cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
# Set the hostname
hostname:  @@{HOSTNAME}@@
fqdn:  @@{HOSTNAME}@@.bang.mpc.local

# Assign static IP address

write_files:
 - path: /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth0
   content: |
     DEVICE=eth0
     BOOTPROTO=static
     ONBOOT=yes
     DEFROUTE=yes
     IPV4_FAILURE_FATAL=yes
     IPV6INIT=no
     IPADDR=@@{IPADDRESS}@@
     NETMASK=@@{NETMASK}@@
     GATEWAY=@@{GATEWAY}@@
     NM_CONTROLLED="no"

 - path: /etc/modprobe.d/blacklist-storage.conf
   content: |
     # we don't want removable media enabled by default
     blacklist usb-storage
     blacklist sbp2
     blacklist firewire-sbp2
     blacklist sr_mod
     blacklist cdrom
     install usb-storage /bin/true
     install sbp2 /bin/true
     install firewire-sbp2 /bin/true
     install sr_mod /bin/true
     install cdrom /bin/true

 - path: /etc/sysconfig/network
   content: |
     HOSTNAME=@@{HOSTNAME}@@.bang.mpc.local
     NETWORKING=yes
     NISDOMAIN=moving-picture

# Run the boot commands
runcmd:
  - [sudo, hostnamectl set-hostname, @@{HOSTNAME}@@.bang.mpc.local]
  - [sudo, ifdown, eth0]
  - [sudo, ifup, eth0]
  - [sudo, systemctl, restart, network]
  - [sudo, systemctl, mask, cloud-init-local, cloud-init, cloud-config, cloud-final]
  - [eject]

final_message: |
  cloud-init has finished
  version: $version
  timestamp: $timestamp
  datasource: $datasource
  uptime: $uptime
